dict.acceptation: 钱柜，钱箱；放钱的抽屉；[地]冰碛土（物）；

sent.orig: He that gapes till he be fed will gape till he be dead.
He that eats till he is sick must fast till he is well.
sent.trans: 吃出病来的人，反而要饿到病好才能再吃。

sent.orig: Till the roof comes off, till the lights go out.
sent.trans: 直到屋顶塌下来，直到灯火都熄灭。

sent.orig: Result that cateran by her till old father good beat arrives till the police suddenly.
sent.trans: 结果那名劫匪被她老爸痛打一顿直到警察赶到为止。

sent.orig: I was not satisfied till that barrier was broken down, till that separateness was destroyed.
sent.trans: 我无法满足，直到那个障碍被拆除，直到那个分别被摧毁。
